thread.title: Sharon Lapsley

author: Sharon Lapsley
title: Sharon Lapsley
text: the book I ordered was sent right away. And boy did they package it well. It was wrapped first in Christmas wrapping paper, then wrapped again in a lot of bubble wrap. It was marked on my order that the book was used, but I saw no indications of anyone having read it, it truly looked brand new. No marks anywhere that I saw. And with a laminated dust jacket to boot! Very pleased with this company and my purchase. And the book was very good as well, the true story of William Christopher (MASH's Father Mulcahey) and his autistic son, Ned.
